source:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Phyna and Ciuna are prepared to fulfill their duty.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ファノヴの里のシュナは、ファイナとともに儀式に挑みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_01<tab>The bond between Phyna and Ciuna has been mended, and now they are prepared to carry out their duty to the village. They ask you to meet with them at the Morning Stars to once more serve as witness to their petition to the heavens.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

姉妹は祭壇を整え、冒険者と共に儀式を始めるそうだ。四つの明星で「ファイナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_02<tab>With hearts as one they pray to the heavens, and no sooner do they finish their incantation than a spirit appears, kissed by thunder. As their witness, it falls to you to slay the spirit and deliver their prayers to the gods.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_02<tab>再び臨んだ儀式では、ふたりの心が一致した証に1体の精霊が出現した。四つの明星で、立会人として「雷の精霊」を倒し、祈りに応じてくれた神々の元へ還そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_03<tab>Your battle is quick like a flash of lightning, and with your final blow you bring the ceremony to a most satisfying conclusion. All the while Phyna and Ciuna are beaming with delight.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者が精霊を無事に還し、儀式は成功した。四つの明星の「ファイナ」と話し、喜びを分かち合おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_04<tab>The twins are overjoyed to see the ceremony was a success, a testament to their commitment to both the village and each other. While they would love nothing more than to share the good news with Lanille, they extend that honor to you while they tend to cleaning the altar.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_04<tab>ファイナとシュナは、儀式の成功をラニルに報告できることを喜んでいるようだ。ファノヴの里で、「ラニル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_05<tab>The ritual is complete, once more ensuring the protection of the gods. The experience has brought Phyna and Ciuna closer together than ever before, but there will yet come a day when they must part ways. It will not be a day for mourning, however, for though their paths will be separate, they will one day lead to a brighter future for Fanow.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_SEQ_05<tab>これからも、それぞれの形でファノヴの里を守り続けることを誓いあったファイナとシュナ。冒険者とラニルは、ふたりの決意を祝福するのだった。
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_TODO_00<tab>四つの明星でファイナと話す
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_TODO_03<tab>ファノヴの里のラニルと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_001<tab>The ritual is certain to work this time. I know it!
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_001<tab>うまくいくって、確信があるの！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_002<tab>I know not how they did it, but I am glad to see them of one heart and mind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_002<tab>まさか、ふたりの仲がこれほど見事に落着するとはな。
儀式の立会人として、改めてよろしく頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_003<tab>It is time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Phyna and I will make ready for the ritual. Meet with us at the Morning Stars when you are ready.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_003<tab>それじゃ、儀式も本番ね。
私たちは先に「四つの明星」で祭壇を整えておくわ。
あなたが来てくれたら始めるから、よろしくね。

TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_010<tab>来てくれてありがとう！
早速はじめましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_011<tab>O spirits of the wood, hear us! We seek to renew our vow to the gods of the Greatwood!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_011<tab>ロンカの讃えし古き神々よ、我らが寄り頼む神々よ。
森の緑はとこしえに栄え、その叡智の不磨なることを願わん。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_012<tab>For the strength to protect these lands, to be the shield that guards against the accursed Light. We demand trial by combat to prove our worth.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_012<tab>命が永久に巡るように、我らの誓いを新たに結ばん。
我らが祈りを届けるべく、御使いを与えたまえ。
森よ、ロンカの護り手の言葉に応えたまえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_013<tab>To Ox'Charl, keeper of the winds. To Ox'Gatorl, keeper of flames. To Yx'Lokwa, bringer of rain. To Yx'Anpa, bringer of the harvest. We beseech you, spirits of the wood─hear our prayers and deliver them!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_013<tab>雨を恵むロックワに、風を送るチャールに、
篝火をかざすガトルに、実りをもたらすアンパの御許に……
この双なる護り手の言葉を運びたまえ……！！

TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_014<tab>雷の精霊だわ！
これって……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_015<tab>A spirit born of wind and rain, whose spark brings fire... And from the ashes may come a rich harvest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_015<tab>雨と風をもたらす雲より湧きて、
火をもたらし、木々を焼きて新たな実りを導く者……！
そんな雷の精霊が顕現したということは……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_016<tab>Our prayers will reach, Sister. There can be no doubt.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_016<tab>4柱の神々すべてに、私たちの想いが届くという証！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_017<tab>As witness to our petition, we task you now with slaying the spirit. Go forth and see our prayers delivered to the heavens.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_017<tab>さぁ、同盟者さん！
儀式を収める立会人として、雷の精霊を還してあげて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_020<tab>Ox'Charl, let <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> be as swift as the wind...
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_021<tab>Ox'Gatorl, give <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> the strength of the fiercest flames...
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_030<tab>The spirit is slain! You did it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_030<tab>やったぁ！
今度こそ、大成功よ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_031<tab>I confess I had my doubts at first, but you performed your duty admirably.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_031<tab>私たち……そして、儀式の立会人である貴方も。
照れくさいけど、心をひとつにできたのね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_032<tab>Would you go and relay the good news to Master Lanille? We will be along shortly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_032<tab>ファノヴの里で「ラニル」が心配しながら待っているはずよ。
儀式の始末をしてすぐに向かうから、先に行っていて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_033<tab>We will be along as soon as we clear away the offerings.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_033<tab>先にファノヴの里へ行って、「ラニル」に伝えておいて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_034<tab>Pray go ahead without us. We will not be long.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_034<tab>儀式の始末を済ませたら、すぐに追いつくわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_040<tab>Phyna. Ciuna. I take it you were successful this time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_040<tab>お前たちのその雰囲気は……
どうやら、儀式は成功したようだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_041<tab>Yes, Master Lanille. Everything is as it should be.
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_042<tab>Though we see the world through different eyes, it does not change how we feel about the Greatwood.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_042<tab>私たち、ものの見方は違うけど、
この里と森を想う気持ちは、少しも変わらなかったの。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_043<tab>In matters concerning Fanow, we are of one heart and one mind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_043<tab>これからも、ふたりで里を支えていくわ。
私は私の、シュナはシュナのやり方で、ね？

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_044<tab>And it is by the strength of your kinship that the Viis shall be blessed for years to come.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_044<tab>お前たちが、自ら答えを見つけることができて何よりだ。
その結論を祝福してこそ、森は良き精霊を遣わし、
神々へ想いを届けてくださったのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_045<tab>As you know all too well, the fulfillment of our duty to the allies of Ronka has necessitated change, and no few of our number feel uncertain of the future. But I believe we have found the answer to our woes, the means by which we may see Fanow thrive once more.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_045<tab>外の世界へと旅立つ者、
森に留まり、神殿の守護を続ける者……
それぞれの在り方を、良しとされたのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_046<tab>For centuries we have trusted none save our own and that will prove our downfall, for none can survive in this world alone. Not even the guardians of Yx'Maja.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_046<tab>お前たち姉妹の悩みは、里の皆が抱えるものでもあったが、
今こうして、ファノヴの答えにもなったな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_047<tab>There is much to be gained from opening our doors to the outside world, and your presence in Fanow has proven that.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_047<tab>我らが里は、古の時代より続く使命を果たし、そして前へと進む。
これも<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿が、
ファノヴの里を訪ねてくれたおかげだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_048<tab>On behalf of all the Viis, you have our humblest thanks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_048<tab>一族を代表して、いま一度感謝を述べよう。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_049<tab>As for you two, I expect great things of you in the future.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_LANILLE_000_049<tab>そして、お前たちの決意にも。
その前途が明るいものであることを、私も心から願っているぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_050<tab>Thank you, Master Lanille. We will not disappoint you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_050<tab>たくさん心配かけたでしょうに……嬉しいわ、ラニル。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_051<tab>Phyna has decided to venture out into the world to find more of our fellow Viis who might be willing to return home.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_051<tab>そう、これからファイナは、
森の外に生きるヴィース族を探す旅に。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_052<tab>And Ciuna has pledged to protect Fanow, and help make our village a place where they will feel welcome.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_052<tab>シュナは、私が旅に出ている間も森を護って、
そして新たに森を訪ねる者を受け入れ、共に生きるのね。

TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_053<tab>これからも、私たちそれぞれの形で、
ファノヴのヴィースであることを、誇りに思っていきましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_054<tab>Still, I will miss you dearly when you are gone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_CIUNA_000_054<tab>ええ……
でも、里を離れることを決めているなら、
ファイナ、やっぱり寂しいわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_055<tab>But I have yet to even decide where I will go, Sister.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_055<tab>そう今すぐ、いなくなったりしないわよ！
まだ、どこに行きたいかもわからないのに。

source: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_056<tab>There is still time for us to be together.
target: TEXT_LUCKZF104_03481_PHYNA_000_056<tab>だからそれまでは、ふたり一緒よ。
